title: test-extension have hardcode path in application.properties
body:
### Describe the bug

quarkus.bt.classpath-recording.record-file ends up with absolute path in tests.

```
quarkus.bt.classpath-recording.record-file=/Users/manderse/code/quarkusio/gradle-enterprise-maven-build-validation/.data/02-validate-local-build-caching-different-locations/20230526T083333-647052bd/first-build_quarkus/integration-tests/test-extension/tests/target/classpath-entries.txt
%test.quarkus.bt.classpath-recording.record-file=/Users/manderse/code/quarkusio/gradle-enterprise-maven-build-validation/.data/02-validate-local-build-caching-different-locations/20230526T083333-647052bd/first-build_quarkus/integration-tests/test-extension/tests/target/classpath-entries-jvm-tests.txt
```
